title: Marketing Assistant
job_overview:
Are you a creative, detail-driven marketer who thrives in a fast-paced, process-focused environment? Do you have a passion for real estate and a knack for engaging content? If you’re looking for a long-term, full-focus virtual role with a friendly, high-performing team, we want to meet you!

Tuesday to Saturday, 8:30 AM – 5:30 PM EST - Applicants must have experience working these hours.

Who We’re Looking For:

Marketing-focused: You love brainstorming content, writing captions, managing social media, and know what grabs attention online.
Process-driven: You follow instructions, double-check your work, and thrive on consistency.
Resourceful & analytical: You dig for answers, research trends, and solve problems independently.
Creative & tech-savvy: You’re comfortable with video editing, blog writing, and using the latest tools and platforms.
Excellent communicator: You keep the team in the loop and manage your time well.
Real estate knowledge is a huge plus!

Key Responsibilities:
Social media management: Create engaging captions, stories, reels, and visual content.
Content creation: Write blogs, email promos, and help plan campaigns.
Video editing: Edit short-form videos for social and web.
Administrative support: Oversee transaction processes, data entry, and help build marketing systems.

How to Apply:

Only applicants who complete the application form below and are within the pay range will be considered.
